title: Intravenous (IV) Vitamin Therapy
text:
IV Therapy
Nutrients delivered intravenously (or via an IV), can be used instantly by the body because they are not lost during the digestive process. Our IV BOOST solutions yield optimal results due to the high concentration of nutrients being delivered directly to the cells via the blood stream. Your body better absorbs and utilizes nutrients delivered through an IV. You feel the benefits right away during the 15-30 minute sessions and they can last up to a week.
With our IV BOOST, you will notice increased energy levels and overall sense of wellbeing. Adequate vitamin levels in the body are necessary for optimal metabolism, cortisol levels, and sleep patterns. Vitamin therapy can also support the immune system, which is important in the winter months and holidays, when stress levels are high.
DETOXBOOST – $200
Our signature vitamin infusion, DETOXBOOST, delivers powerful antioxidants and electrolytes to leave you feeling invigorated and refreshed. With antioxidant powerhouse glutathione as the main ingredient, DETOXBOOST helps to deeply cleanse and restore your body.
Boosts immune system
Reduces inflammation
Cleanses vitals organs
Increases energy
MYERSBOOST – $200
The MYERSBOOST, is a widely renowned infusion, Myers Cocktail, with over 30 years of use as a remedy to help maintain and restore your body’s natural balance. Using magnesium, calcium, B vitamins and Vitamin C, this infusion has been known to alleviate a number of health conditions like fatigue, migraines, depression, muscle pain and menstrual cramps.
Alleviates PMS symptoms
Alleviates conditions that cause chronic pain
Reduces mood disorders and anxiety
WEIGHTLOSSBOOST $225
Maximize your weight loss efforts with our WEIGHTLOSSBOOST. This boost combines B vitamins, l-carnitine, amino acids and and magnesium to help keep you active and alert.
Increases natural energy levels
Helps regulate mood and suppresses appetite
Enhances metabolism to promote natural weight loss
IMMUNEBOOST $200
Our IMMUNEBOOST is for those suffering from chronic immune conditions or those who just want a quick and effective pick me up. This boost sends high doses of Vitamin C and a wide spectrum of vitamins, minerals, amino acids and super antioxidant Glutathione directly into the blood stream.
Gears up the immune systems ability to fight invaders and stressors
Increases natural energy levels
FAQ
Hardly. It feels just like getting your blood drawn. A delicate, small needled is used to deliver vitamins and other nutrients into your blood stream. It’s virtually pain-free.
It’s rare… but bruising can happen when the IV punctures the vein and the blood collects under the skin. Although not terribly common, it is seen sometimes after an IV infusion. This bruising usually goes away after a few days.
Most of our IV’s contain nothing that the human body can overdose on. If you are healthy, theoretically it is safe for daily use. Realistically, most people do not put such high demands on their bodies where they would need daily therapy. Our most frequent dosage is a bi-weekly or monthly program. You should tailor your IV therapy to adjust to your bodies demand.
Our IV Boosts are administered by our registered nurse over a 15-30 minute period. During this time, you will be seated comfortably while the drip is flowing into your system. Feel free to bring a book or magazine of choice.
Book a Wellness Assessment
Have multiple health goals and you’re not sure where to start? Sit with a Health Professional to create a specialized wellness program tailored to your specific health concerns.
